sentences.en: ‘Where are you going?’ she demanded angrily.
sentences.cn: “你要去哪里？” 她气愤地质问道。

sentences.en: a note payable on demand.
sentences.cn: 一张见票即付的票据

sentences.en: all these skills are much in demand.
sentences.cn: 所有这些技术都十分需要。

sentences.en: Angry demonstrators demanded the resignation of two senior officials.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

sentences.en: Another flight would be arranged on Saturday if sufficient demand arose.
sentences.cn: 如果需求量足够大，周六将再安排一趟航班。

sentences.en: Because of the slump in domestic demand, production has stopped.
sentences.cn: 由于国内需求大幅下降，生产已经停止。

sentences.en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentences.en: Demand for coal is down and so are prices.
sentences.cn: 煤的需求下降了，煤价也相应下跌。

sentences.en: Demand picked up and a reprint was required last November.
sentences.cn: 由于需求量上升，去年11月，再版已是势在必行。

sentences.en: fed the baby on demand.
sentences.cn: 无微不至地照料婴儿

sentences.en: In less than two hours Cohen capitulated to virtually every demand.
sentences.cn: 还不到两个小时，科恩就屈服了，接受了几乎一切要求。

sentences.en: Isn't this a demand to control the randomness of life?
sentences.cn: 这难道不是要求对生命的无常加以控制吗？

sentences.en: It’s a desperate situation demanding a desperate remedy.
sentences.cn: 情况危急，需要背水一战。

sentences.en: Like any other public servants, police must respond to public demand.
sentences.cn: 和其他所有公务员一样，警察必须服务于公众的需求。

sentences.en: Production is still increasing faster than demand.
sentences.cn: 生产仍比需求增长快。

sentences.en: The demand for places at some schools exceeds the supply.
sentences.cn: 某些学校的入学申请人数超过了招生。

sentences.en: The demand generated by one factory required the construction of another.
sentences.cn: 一家工厂产生的需求使得必须再建造一家工厂。

sentences.en: The fusty old establishment refused to recognise the demand for popular music.
sentences.cn: 这一古板的老旧机构拒绝承认人们对流行音乐的需求。

sentences.en: The reduced consumer demand is also affecting company profits.
sentences.cn: 消费需求的降低也影响到了公司的利润。

sentences.en: The two saleswomen were busily trying to keep up with the demand.
sentences.cn: 那两名女售货员正忙着接待顾客。

sentences.en: Their inclination to wait and demand more resources desolated President Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 他们总是等待并要求得到更多资财的倾向让林肯总统甚感不快。

sentences.en: Too many things demanded his attention at the same time.
sentences.cn: 太多事情同时需要他的关注。

sentences.en: We just can't find enough good second-hand cars to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 我们实在找不到足够多的性能良好的二手车，满足不了需求。

words.tran_cn: 苛求的；要求高的；吃力的

phrases.tran_cn: 消费需求；消费者的要求
国内需求；本地内部需求
能源需求；需能量；能量需要
满足需要，满足要求；符合要求
有求必应：处于被需要或被请求的时刻

trans.tran_en: the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services
to ask for something very firmly, especially because you think you have a right to do this
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services

trans.tran_cn: 要求， 强令； 需要； 询问
trans.tran_en: if one thing demands another, it needs that thing in order to happen or be done successfully
